metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13091 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** pandas through 1.0.3 can unserialize and execute commands from an untrusted file that is passed to the read_pickle() function, if __reduce__ makes an os.system call. NOTE: third parties dispute this issue because the read_pickle() function is documented as unsafe and it is the user's responsibility to use the function in a secure manner.

criterions.comment: pandas package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
